reviews.sentence: Best location. Location spa facilities. Overall is not bad but some negative side of the hotel is basic things like bedroom slipper n bathrobe is not provided in a 5 star hotel like them.
Perfect hotel. Very clean and spacious room very grand lobby perfect gym room perfect skybar located next to central world. Everything is just perfect.

Hotel at strategic location. 1. centralized location surrounded by many shopping centres shops restaurants n eateries 2 very good gym pool n rooftop bar. 3 very good free in room wifi. A very nice comfortable stay for our 5D4N shopping n eating trip in Bangkok. Will stay here again if the room rate is competetive or with discount.

Excellent except for the seriously hard bed. Very friendly staff and helpful. Concierge made restaurant bookings for us too. Big spacious room. Big bathroom. Great city views. Only complaint with the room was the bed. Have to say the most uncomfortable bed I have ever slept in. So incredibly hard. Was like there was no mattress at all. Location is excellent. The Sky Train is close by and the Sky Walks too. Definitely want to walk along the Sky Walks rather than the footpath when you can. Covered and away from traffic fumes. You can walk directly into the Central World Mall from the hotel. The mall is ginormous. It is Two floors of just restaurants so great when it is really hot out or raining. It is so big that even staying here for 6 days we still walked past new stores every day. Easy walk from the hotel to the other major malls too. Pool I chose this hotel for three reasons. it is location and star rating but more importantly it is pool. We wanted to be able to lie in the sun by a pool. There are many beautiful looking pools when you look at Bangkok hotels online. But when you look at the tourist taken photos you will note that most of their shots are in shade. that is because many hotels have other tall buildings all around them. Not so for the Centara Grand at Central World. There are NO tall buildings directly beside the hotel. Nothing to create shade on the pool area. There are umbrellas and trees polside if you want shade but plenty in the sun if you want it. Pool temperature is cool though. Definitely refreshing but a little too cool if you wanted to hang out in it. Hotel breakfast pretty good. Yummy pastries etc. Omelette station made to order. Coffee would have to be the best non espresso Coffee we have ever had in a hotel from anywhere we have been in the world. We were very surprised as we usually immediately order machine espresso type coffees because the brewed Coffee is so bad. Not here. They serve it in two portion sized Coffee pots. The gym is well equipped. We used it every day before breakfast. Had to work off the cocktails and food from the night before. Spa we had massages which were very good. Quite a large variety of massage types to choose from. Would definitely stay here again but I will be asking whether they have rooms with softer beds first. The hard bed and I am not exaggerating it was rock hard was the only downside here.

Amazing Hotel and Amazing Service. We had an amazing stay at the Centara Grand. The hotel is phenomenal in fact so good we hardly left. The views are breath taking the pool and tennis courts are spectacular and the location superb. However it is the staff that makes this truly excellent. They could not do more to help. Our bags had been delayed so they arranged their delivery to the hotel with the airline Ruji Rawat from the concierge team was so helpful booking transfers for us and some other friends who were not even staying at the hotel. He went above and beyond like all the staff at the hotel. Thank you for an amazing stay. oh and Breakfast is sublime.

In the heart of Bangkok. Great stay at this hotel spacious rooms staff were always acomodating fantastic breakfast really nice pool and gym which was never to busy despite the size of the hotel. Perfect location and endless shopping just seconds away. The only thing I could fault was at times you have to wait a long time for the elevators. That aside I would stay here again.

Wonderful staff great hotel. I was technically on holiday with my dad but there was not that option on the list of who I was travelling with. The room was spacious with incredible views. The staff were lovely. I turned up a bit frazzled and not particularly well dressed and they showed no sign of snootiness. The pool was of a good size and the clean. The gym was of a decent size great views and all the facilities that are needed. The champagne bar at sunset was incredible. I did not want to leave the hotel. Would very much recommend.
Excellent. Gym and pool great staff superb and position simple perfect. Air conditioning in the room not so good it seems filter have to be clean.

Good location warm service. The hotel is very CBD area and very convenient for business activities and shopping experience. The service is also good not just for normal service but for the correcting action after my advice it is very quick and prompt.
Convenient location with nice view from hotel room. Various facilities in the gym though i was being stopped doing deadlift there due to meeting room is located below the gym floor.

Just so so. As a 5 stars rated hotel the decoration and interior design is not my taste I love the breakfast the equipment in gym room. hotel too old electric plug just only fit thai type OMG. staff not so friendly and I have not good experience during my first day breakfast anyway maybe more suitable for shopaholic but not mine.

Exceptional. We stayed in a 2 room apartment which came with club facilities. Beautiful “ welcome ” large bowl of fruits chocolates chilled champagne. Complimentary breakfast decent spread with champagne to boot. Tea time snacks pre dinner cocktails and snacks. Pre lunch soup after dinner treats too. Plus complimentary laundry services. Staff were extremely helpful friendly. There was a note that says they will loan you gym gear shoes at the gym if you did not pack any. Sun block is provided too. Amazing. The hotel is a short walk through the adjacent convention centre car park indoors into the supermarket at Centralworld on the 7th floor. Short walk to Platinum mall other malls on the covered sky walk. Slightly further walk to Siam Paragon. And free shuttle bus next door to Bangkok Lux Outlet mall near Suvarnabhumi airport. There ’s also a free shuttle from the Outlet mall to the airport.

Nice business Hotel. Let down by extreme prices. Comfortable room. Staff were very helpful and polite. I liked that. Nice view from the room. Skybar with amazing views of the City. Worth going up. Great Photo opportunities. First class breakfast. Crazy prices. Hotel is more suited to business people. Could only afford one drink at Red Skybar. Would have used the Spa but again far too expensive. I expected more for what I paid for my one night stay. Would have enjoyed some lunch by the Pool but too expensive.

Perfect place foe a city trip with the family. It was the third stay and we will come back next year. The pool was a litel chill otherwise it was great. The workout place was clean and it was pleaesent. My son sadly could not use the workout machines because of his age 13. Even when he knows how fo handel it.
